metadata.Name: Belgian Statutory Article Retrieval Dataset (BSARD)
metadata.Description: A dataset for statutory article retrieval in French, containing 1,100+ legal questions and 22,600+ law articles.
metadata.Paper Title: A Statutory Article Retrieval Dataset in French
metadata.Abstract: Statutory article retrieval is the task of automatically retrieving law articles relevant to a legal question. This paper presents BSARD, a novel French native expert-annotated statutory article retrieval dataset. BSARD consists of 1,100+ French native legal questions labeled by experienced jurists with relevant articles from a corpus of 22,600+ Belgian law articles. Using BSARD, we benchmark several state-of-the-art retrieval approaches, including lexical and dense architectures, both in zero-shot and supervised setups.
